Darkfate:

Darkfate told to Drillbit "I think that would be good idea that 
Darkmouse stay here, she and chameleon could use the base's cannons 
to guard them... I think that would be dangerous to our ally if 
Darkmouse is captured for the enemy."

He also looked top Megaton "Are you ready to fight against Hell 
beast, Megatron's ally?"
